skills.name: Use substitution to check whether a value is a solution to a linear equation
Use substitution to check whether a value is a solution to an inequality

explanations.A: 15//5 = 3 and 4 - 3 = 1 which is less than 2. Test out all the numbers again seeing which give an answer that is greater than or equal to 2!
explanations.B: Every value in the set is greater than 2 but we need to substitute each value into the expression 4 - 洧논/5 and see if that is greater than or equal to 2...
